data.name: ControlActions
desc: Control actions for common and extended controls of a FilePicker.

items.name: ADD_ITEM
lines: Adds an item to the content of the listbox.
The given item has to be a string.

items.name: ADD_ITEMS
lines: Adds a sequence of strings to the content of the listbox.

items.name: DELETE_ITEM
lines: Removes an item from a listbox.
The given value has to be a position. If the position is invalid an exception will be thrown. The index of the first position is 0. The value should be a sal_Int32.

items.name: DELETE_ITEMS
lines: Removes all items from the listbox.

items.name: SET_SELECT_ITEM
lines: Selects an item in a listbox.

The given value has to be a position. The index of the first position is 0. A value of -1 removes the selection. If the given position is invalid an exception will be thrown. The value should be a sal_Int32.

items.name: GET_ITEMS
lines: Returns all items of the listbox as a sequence of strings.

items.name: GET_SELECTED_ITEM
lines: The returned item is an empty string if the listbox is empty or no item is selected.

items.name: GET_SELECTED_ITEM_INDEX
lines: Returns the zero based index of the currently selected item.
If the listbox is empty or there is no item selected -1 will be returned. The returned value is a sal_Int32.

items.name: SET_HELP_URL
lines: Sets the help URL of a control.

items.name: GET_HELP_URL
lines: Retrieves the help URL of a control.
